title: HOUR 2 - Eric Shanks and Rod Woodson
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Eric Shanks and Rod Woodson
description:
FoxSports CEO and Executive Producer Eric Shanks joins to talk what it was like for the Fox network to bring John Madden to the network. NFL Hall of Fame Safety Rod Woodson also joins to talk Madden and his days in Oakland.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
